p.s: The scene from the film The Hate U Give directed by George Tillmann Jr., which was published in 2018, is about Chris confronting Starr, who is upset and tries to apologize about something that happened.
The scene deals with Chris walking into the school hallway of the Williamson High School, while Starr packs her things into a locker.
Chris comes up to Starr and tries to cheer her up by making her listen to his music with headphones.
Starr enjoys the music but tells Chris off about something which happened before hand.
Chris tries to apologize to Starr and tells her that he misses her.
He also tries to cheer Starr up by dancing in the hallway with the music he made for her.
Starr laughs and pulls him away from the hallway.
As a quick conclusion, this scene introduces Chris as Starr's boyfriend and their relationship between them.
